amendment.description: Amendment sought to stipulate that the bill cannot go into effect until the Secretary confirms that the act does not adversely affect any community's water supply or water budget.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 113-340 to stipulate that the bill cannot go into effect until the Secretary confirms that the act does not adversely affect any community's water supply or water budget.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peters (CA) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 231 (Roll no. 48).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Peters (CA) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 231 (Roll no. 48).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Peters (CA).
